TopicTitle: New Terms Of Use, what's changed?

Articles.Content: Hello. I just logged in this morning and had to read all the terms and conditions, press agree, and then access the site. So... what's changed about them?

From my own reading, the only thing that's changed is that some references to Squad have been replaced by references to Take Two. This makes sense to me.

None of the other rules have changed, except for some minor wording differences (staff members instead of moderators, for example). Practically, this makes no difference to anyone- you, me, or Joe Q. Public reading the forums without an account.

There was some confusion about the Add-on posting rules, but those haven't been changed since the middle of February, and that was to clarify about including other licensed work with your Add-on.
Not easily summarized. Read all about it here:
